text: yea k kau b ban pol tha yeung min ach banhchoun ke towcheamuoy puok anak ban laey louhtrate puok anak thveu kechchasanyea cheamuoy yeung daoy sbath nung a l laoh tha puok anak pitchea nung noam ke tralb mk chuob yeung vinh leuklengte puok anak trauv laomptth( daoy puok sa trauv) bonnaoh . haey nowpel del puokke ban thveu kechchasanyea cheamuoy keat keat ka pol tha a l laoh chea anak thveusaeaksaei champoh avei del puok yeung niyeay
